price: 19. Kaadu hebltô numuy kay xaqul elle galtima niqmat ley kaah yemqe mayan.
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
